<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Cancel schedule the Payment of a Bill transaction"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/payment/payment-slip/scheduler/cancel/{pactualId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Use this endpoint in order to cancel schedule a payment of a submitted Bill payment to our API from your own application.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
